amendment.description: An amendment numbered 52 printed in Part B of House Report 118-261 to prohibit the Department of Transportation from contributing funds to the National Highway and Traffic Safety Administration to enforce any rules or regulation in relation to center high-mounted stop lamps, a type of rear brake light.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gooden (TX) amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gooden (TX) amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gooden (TX) amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
